t: I*p will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O Lord,*s will I sing.
I*p will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
I*p will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
A*p froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.
Whoso*p privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.
Mine*p eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
He*p that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.
I*p will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the Lord.*s
